attributes.action: replace all the existing Discrimination legislation (Sex Discrimination, Race Discrimination, Age Discrimination, Religious Discrimination &c &c) with a single law to cover ALL UNFAIR DISCRIMINATION regardless of the motivation behind it.  If any instance of Discrimination is unfair then why does anyone have to prove what the motive was ?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Often it is not possible to prove why someone has been discriminated against although it is clear that they have not been treated as fairly as others would have been. AND why should certain forms of Unfair Discrimination be illegal and others legal?  What if someone were discriminated againstfor some unique or unusual reason (such as hair-colour or freckles) would that be any less wrong than if it were because of their skin colour or creed or sex?
